alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 10 at 3:56AM MST until January 11 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Western Mosquito Range and Eastern Sawatch Mountains Above 11,000 Feet. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong winds could cause tree damage. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sawatch Mountains above 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Lake County Above 11000 Ft
